content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for showing interest in my apartment, Ryanah. Before we discuss the rental price, may I ask what is the duration of your stay in New York?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I will be staying for 2 years
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Great, thank you for letting me know. Based on the length of your stay, I would like to propose a rental price of 1,000 Euros per month. This price takes into account the size of the apartment, as well as the current market rates in New York. Is this price acceptable to you?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 1,000 Euros per month. Thank you for your understanding.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for accepting my proposal, Ryanah. I am happy to hear that you are satisfied with the rental price. Before we proceed, may I ask if you would like to sign a lease agreement and pay a security deposit?
name: Heinrich Heine
